short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScoutX, Product research tool for Amazon Sellers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScoutX is a product research tool for Amazon Sellers that allows you to see all of the important data points in one handy widget. Calculate profit, see sales rank history and analytics, view product variations, reviews, and more!
